title: Free and perfectly safe but only partially effective vaccine
author: Talamàs; Eduard; Vohra; Rakesh
description: Risk compensation can undermine the ability of partially-effective vaccines to curb epidemics: Vaccinated agents may optimally choose to engage in more risky interactions and, as a result, may increas
cleaned_text: Free and perfectly safe but only partially effective vaccines can harm everyone Download full text from publisher As the access to this document is restricted, you may want to [search](/cgi-bin/htsearch?q=%22Free+and+perfectly+safe+but+only+partially+effective+vaccines+can+harm+everyone%22) for a different version of it.
